title: Forsaken Fiora - Skin Concept
body:
https://41.media.tumblr.com/212bd2570e8b0cb2e29831520c36bb6a/tumblr_no907sTWtg1qk32lpo1_1280.png

_**"They dare not strike back."**_

Hey everyone! I painted a quick Forsaken skin concept for Fiora that I wanted to share!

It's been a few years since Fiora's last skin, and given the relative lack of variety in terms of her visuals and particles on her current skins, I think she'd be a perfect fit for the Forsaken/Chosen skin line! Fiora's base skills inherently have little particle effects outside of the shining effect on Riposte and Blade Waltz, so  to remedy that and add a little more to her abilities, I think this would make for a great 1350 tier skin! It'd be her first skin with a recall animation, and In my head it features new particles, new SFX on her AA and abilities, a corrupted filter on her VO, and maybe a new haste or AA animation when she activates burst of speed. I hope you guys like it! Let me know what you think!

Edit: here's a quick example of what her VO might sound like. I'm not great with Audacity and don't know many effects, so it's a little underwhelming, but I figured I'd throw something together!

https://soundcloud.com/thomas-randby/forsaken-fiora-vo-test

Why not Chosen Jayce and Forsaken Yi then?
http://i.imgur.com/YAGpXPd.png

Chosen Yi already uses a red lightsaber.  Wouldn't make sense for a Sith-based skin to do so as well, unless you changed Chosen Yi to use a Yellow/Blue/Green (Yellow is for Jedi Sentinel the guard the Jedi Temple).  Why a whole line of Jedi/Sith skins?  Seems ridiculous to have all sword users now be Jedi/Sith.  Can't skins be creative enough without touching other universes.
Don't they already have creative skins based on alternate universes?

Obviously they do.  While I'm glad that they are fans of other things, every company doesn't need to make their own version of everybody else's stuff.  Create something new and different for skins, not just go "Oh, there's a popular thing - let's copy/port over that theme/style for money."  Chosen Master Yi - Star Wars, Star Guardian Lux - Sailor Mon, Alice in Wonderland theme, etc. etc.
I'm not sure why it has to be one or the other when they're doing both.

Then why not make a Star Wars movie with Capt. Kirk, the Red Queen from Alice in Wonderland, one of the Doctors from Doctor Who, Doc Holliday, Capt. Jack Sparrow, a Futbol/Soccer player, and some other random folks?  You don't.  The story would be highly unbelievable.  It makes the game look like a bowl of universes puked up together.  It makes no sense from a story perspective.  You can say "this skin isn't canon" all you want, but it's still in the game.  Some skins can be alright as a champ may have other attire for different missions/events/etc. (and could be tied to lore events, if Riot chose to do so.), but other universe (SW, Sailor Moon, etc.) stuff is irritating and nonsensical.
The game and the story are two separate things now, so that's technically all the more reason to do it. They still make skins tied to lore, but they're what-if universes like the Arclights.
